com.barrybecker4.common.math.cutpoints
Class CutPointGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.barrybecker4.common.math.cutpoints.CutPointGenerator

public class CutPointGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Calculates nicely rounded intervals for a specified range. From an article by Paul Heckbert in Graphics Gems 1.

getCutPoints

public double[] getCutPoints(Range range,
                             int maxNumTicks)
Retrieve the cut point values. If its a really small range include both min and max to avoid having just one label.

Parameters:
range - range to be divided into intervals.
maxNumTicks - upper limit on number of cut points to return.
Returns:
the cut points

getCutPointLabels

public java.lang.String[] getCutPointLabels(Range range,
                                            int maxTicks)
Labels for the found cut points.

Parameters:
range - tickmark range.
Returns:
cut point labels
